name: VoteMyProxy
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vote my proxy
des:
As an investor in a company, you have a right to be heard when it comes to that company’s direction. Let Alexa help you vote your proxy for the investments you hold.
Once you have enabled the skill, say “Alexa, vote my proxy.”

You will be asked for the 12-digit control number which can be found on the voter information card you received. Alexa will be able to help you “voice” your annual proxy vote for each of the proposals on the company's annual meeting agenda. For each proposal presented by Alexa choose one of the available voting options: For, Against or Abstain.

Please refer to your voter information form to obtain your control number or for additional voting options.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
